pullRequest.title: [CDAP-16690] Add preview data view
pullRequest.bodyText:
Building off of PR that added the preview endpoint: #12240
JIRA: https://issues.cask.co/browse/CDAP-16690
Build: https://builds.cask.co/browse/CDAP-URUT259-1
Revamping the preview data view to use a React component and material-ui. Styling is based on MarkdownTable component. Also included updates to preview status (i.e. changes from #12130).

Since we are using map, I believe we should assign key to each element. Maybe we can assign its index?
nit: Should these strings perhaps be placed separately at constants.ts file?
Should these fields (preview-id, selected-node-name, ...) get indented?
